Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Repaint \Re*paint"\ (r?-p?nt"), v. t. To paint anew or again; as, to repaint a house; to repaint the ground of a picture. [1913 Webster]

repaint v 1: paint again; "He repainted the same scenery many times during his life" 2: paint again or anew; "We had to repaint the gutters with linseed oil" 3: paint again; "He repainted the wall after the child smeared it with tomato sauce"
